about.title: About DAMI AIR
about.description: With over 10 years of experience, DAMI AIR offers custom HVAC solutions backed by licensed technicians and trusted brands.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.intro: At DAMI AIR PTY LTD, our strength lies in our people. We're a team of fully qualified and licensed refrigerant handlers, plumbers, and electricians, committed to delivering safe, compliant, and high-quality air conditioning solutions across Melbourne.
team.experience: Our team brings years of hands-on experience across residential, renovation, and new build projects. We are dedicated to safety, efficiency, and customer satisfaction, and our technicians are regularly trained to stay up-to-date with the latest industry standards and energy efficiency practices.
team.capabilities: From new installations to complex energy upgrades and HVAC servicing, our technicians bring years of hands-on experience, technical knowledge, and attention to detail to every project. We are licensed in accordance with Australian regulations and experienced across residential, renovation, and new build projects.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.pricingDescription: Competitive rates and clear upfront pricing for all our services
whyChooseUs.brandsDescription: We work with leading HVAC manufacturers
whyChooseUs.supportDescription: 24/7 customer support and rapid response times

cta.title: Need HVAC service you can trust?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today for professional heating and cooling solutions tailored to your needs.

footer.companyDescription: DAMI AIR is your trusted provider of heating and cooling solutions. With over 10 years of experience, we deliver professional HVAC services across Melbourne, backed by licensed technicians and quality workmanship.
